address: Xã An Thạnh 3, Huyện Cù Lao Dung, Tỉnh Sóc Trăng
thought:
**Mapping the Old Address to the New Administrative Structure**

Okay, here's how I'm going to tackle this. First, I've got the old address: Xã An Thạnh 3, Huyện Cù Lao Dung, Tỉnh Sóc Trăng.  The district is essentially irrelevant here since we're "eliminating all districts" as requested. So, I need to figure out where "Xã An Thạnh 3" falls in the current scheme.

My initial thought is that I need to begin by working on Sóc Trăng, given that it's the province. I'll look through Resolution 60-NQ/TW, checking whether Sóc Trăng is subject to merging, but I don't see anything obvious. Then, I see Item 19: that Sóc Trăng is merged into Cần Thơ, becoming a part of it.

That's the first key piece of information.  Now, I need to know where Xã An Thạnh 3 ends up. This suggests that I need to look at resolutions concerning Cần Thơ, given that it is a new administrative area for the relevant parts of Soc Trang. Resolution 1668/NQ-UBTVQH15, concerning the administrative re-organization of Cần Thơ, looks promising.

Scanning through this resolution, I'm specifically looking for any mention of Xã An Thạnh 3. Ah, there it is! Line 95. "Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã An Thạnh 2, Đại Ân 1, An Thạnh 3 và An Thạnh Nam thành xã mới có tên gọi là **xã Cù Lao Dung**." Bingo!  That explicitly tells me An Thạnh 3 is now part of the new ward, "Xã Cù Lao Dung".

Now I just need to cross-reference this with the "New Wards" data.  I see "Xã Cù Lao Dung" listed with ward code "31633" and province "Thành phố Cần Thơ". That matches perfectly.

The confidence here is high.  The old ward is *explicitly* mentioned in the resolution that creates the new ward, and the province has already been remapped.  The old ward becomes part of the new ward, so the mapping is straightforward.  I'm very confident in this.  The final result will be a JSON array containing the reference to the resolution and line with the relevant information, the confidence, the new province, the new ward code and name.

citation.header: 1668/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của thành phố Cần Thơ
citation.line: 95. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã An Thạnh 2, Đại Ân 1, An Thạnh 3 và An Thạnh Nam thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Cù Lao Dung.
